title: Combating Climate Change, Wellness Innovation, 3D Fashion
itunes:title: Combating Climate Change, Wellness Innovation, 3D Fashion
description:
Julia Jackson of Proprietor Jackson Family Wines, talks about Grounded, an organization that identifies and advances climate crisis solutions. Herbie Calves, President at MYX Fitness, discusses the launch of at-home wellness innovation. Lena and Sharon Lim, Co-Founders of Browzwear, explain 3D fashion design and development.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
